sentences.en: " In fact you can have the kitchen - maid wash your own laundry.
sentences.cn: 就是你自己底衣服,也可叫黄妈洗的. ”

sentences.en: Before entering the bathroom, he emptied his dirty laundry into the hamper.
sentences.cn: 进浴室前，他把脏衣服全都放进洗衣筐里。

sentences.en: From what time do you accept laundry tomorrow morning?
sentences.cn: 明早几时开始可以送洗衣物?

sentences.en: He worked in the laundry at Oxford prison.
sentences.cn: 他在牛津监狱的洗衣房工作。

sentences.en: He'd put his dirty laundry in the clothes basket.
sentences.cn: 他会把自己的脏衣服扔进洗衣篮里。
我把要洗的衣服分了类。
请把洗好的衣物晾出去.

sentences.en: Please send clothes to the laundry.
sentences.cn: 请把这些衣物送往洗衣店.

sentences.en: She could ring for food and drink, laundry and sundry services.
sentences.cn: 她可以打电话点餐，叫人来取要洗的衣服以及叫其他各种服务。

sentences.en: She did the laundry (= washed the clothes etc ) and hung it out to dry.
sentences.cn: 她洗了衣服，然后挂出去晾干。

sentences.en: The report on the hospital mentioned such desiderata as a supply of clean laundry.
sentences.cn: 报告中提到该医院需要干净的洗换物品.

sentences.en: There's a lot of laundry in the basket.
sentences.cn: 筐子里有许多要洗的衣物.

sentences.en: We had to have the washing done at the laundry.
sentences.cn: 我们得把衣服拿到洗衣店去洗。

sentences.en: We shouldn't wash our dirty laundry in public and if I was in his position, I'd say nothing at all.
sentences.cn: 家丑不宜外扬，如果我是他的话，我就什么也不说。

words.tran_cn: 洗涤；清洗；洗黑钱（把来路可疑的钱弄得貌似合法）

phrases.tran_cn: 洗衣服务；爱情洗礼（专辑名称）

trans.tran_cn: 洗衣物，洗衣店，洗衣房，要（或正在）洗的衣物，刚洗好的衣物
trans.tran_en: clothes, sheets etc that need to be washed or have just been washed
